definition: to hold in store/to contain (untapped reserves etc)
to accumulate/to hold in store/to contain/to gather together/to collect/depth/inner strength/profundity
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: It contains the whole gospel and the essence of the covenant of grace. It has been in great measure fulfilled.
sentences.chinese: 應許中涵蓋了全本的福音，也蘊藏著恩典之約的精髓。

sentences.english: Once the clay is mined out, the pit is filled and totally revegetated.
sentences.chinese: 一旦挖掘完粘土，礦就會被填充並且完全重新蘊藏。

sentences.english: Many of the deposits are too small, too impure .
sentences.chinese: 許多蘊藏量太小，質地太不純。

sentences.english: The undulating hills are rich in mineral resources.
sentences.chinese: 峯巒起伏的羣山中蘊藏着豐富的礦產資源。

sentences.english: Many sections and chapters of acupuncture and moxibustion in The Yellow Emperor's Internal Classic contain a principle of pulse taking.
sentences.chinese: 《內經》的許多鍼灸篇章中都蘊藏着一個診脈原則。

sentences.english: Sasha Gunnar solskjaer island near a oil reserves.
sentences.chinese: 薩索斯島附近有石油蘊藏。

sentences.english: The area is abundant in petroleum deposits.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區石油蘊藏量豐富。

sentences.english: Colorful spring of boundless energy, blooming with Pompon life.
sentences.chinese: 色彩斑斕的春天，蘊藏着無限活力，勃發着蓬蓬生機。

sentences.english: According to the legend, the pyramid contains transformation powers.
sentences.chinese: 傳說中，這座金字塔蘊藏着變換的神力。

sentences.english: There is great force hidden in a sweet command .
sentences.chinese: 語重心長的命令，蘊藏巨大的力量。

sentences.english: So the meaning lies in the ordinary life.
sentences.chinese: 所以，意義是蘊藏在平凡之中的。

sentences.english: But proven reserves are only estimates and not fixed numbers.
sentences.chinese: 不過，證實的蘊藏量其實只是估計值，並非確切數字。

sentences.english: Abundant information about paleooceanographical environmental changes can be recorded in the deep-sea sediments.
sentences.chinese: 深海沉積物蘊藏了豐富的古海洋環境變化信息。

sentences.english: It is worth noting that this is not crude that is directly in shale.
sentences.chinese: 要指出的是，這並非直接蘊藏在頁岩中的原油。

sentences.english: Gold reserves in the western mountains and White Marble marble, and rich reserves.
sentences.chinese: 西部山內蘊藏金礦和漢白玉大理石，且儲量豐富。

sentences.english: In our opinion the whole question lies in the amount of thought that is mingled with prayer.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲問題的關健在於蘊藏在祈禱中的思想的多少。

definition: precious mineral deposits/hidden treasure/(fig.) treasure/(Buddhism) the treasure of Buddha's law
opportunity to live/to reprieve from death/life force/vitality
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
hidden beneath the surface/buried and concealed
vivid/lively/(of food ingredients) live or fresh
